title: Transvaal

coverImg.altText: Coat of Arms of the South African Republic, and later, the Transvaal Province.

summary: The Province of the Transvaal (Afrikaans: Provinsie van die Transvaal), commonly referred to as the Transvaal, was a province of South Africa from 1910 until the end of apartheid in 1994, when a new constitution subdivided it.
